chapter.title: WeeChat
chapter.para: WeeChat is a fast and extensible IRC client.

section.title: Basic Usage
section.para: By default, the module creates a systemd unit which runs the chat client in a detached screen session.
The service is managed by a dedicated user named weechat in the state directory /var/lib/weechat.

section.title: Re-attaching to WeeChat
section.para:
WeeChat runs in a screen session owned by a dedicated user. To explicitly allow your another user to attach to this session, the screenrc needs to be tweaked by adding multiuser support:
{ programs.screen.screenrc = '' multiuser on acladd normal_user ''; }
Now, the session can be re-attached like this:
screen -x weechat/weechat-screen

para.emphasis: The session name can be changed using services.weechat.sessionName.
